english.segment1: I love it, I hate it. For the fire it stirs in me. My passion, soul ashen. Do I want to be set free?
english.segment2: When time marches on relentless. I reach for you. When pressing on seems senseless. I reach (for you)
english.segment3: Kill my idols. Only you can satisfy. Kill my idols. You won't let me calcify
english.segment4: I love it, I hate it. Like I love and hate myself. You are my golden eye. Teach me to delight in you
english.segment5: And you can take. You can take it all away. My fist is open. You can take it all away
